SEARCH
Package com.example.modular_multi_loader_template.platform.types

Record Class PlatformInfo

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.example.modular_multi_loader_template.platform.types.PlatformInfo
Record Components:
type - The type of platform (e.g., "Fabric", "Forge", "NeoForge", "Quilt", "Vanilla").
version - The version of the platform.
gameVersion - The version of the game.
gameDirectory - The directory where the game is installed.
isDevelopment - Indicates whether the platform is running in a development environment (e.g., for testing/debugging).
environment - The execution environment (e.g., CLIENT, SERVER).
runningModsSupplier - Supplier for information about currently running mods.
operatingSystem - The operating system the platform is running on.
public record PlatformInfo(Platform type, String version, String gameVersion, Path gameDirectory, boolean isDevelopment, Environment environment, Supplier<List<ModInfo>> runningModsSupplier, OperatingSystem operatingSystem) extends Record
Represents information about the current platform and environment.

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
